title: Rod of Discord
summaries: The Rod of Discord is a Hardmode tool that instantly teleports the player to the mouse cursor. Using the Rod of Discord costs no mana or ammunition; however, each use inflicts the Chaos State debuff on the player for (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 6 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 9 seconds. Using the Rod while this debuff is active causes the player to lose health equal to (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 of their maximum health. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Rod of Discord's teleport range is limited to 960 pixels (60 tiles) horizontally and 600 pixels (37.5 tiles) vertically from the player's center. The Rod of Discord has a 1/500 (0.2%) / 1/400 (0.25%) chance of being dropped by Chaos Elementals.
It can be upgraded into the Rod of Harmony(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) by throwing it into Shimmer after the Moon Lord has been defeated.
